content: 7 round 103 5sc 1dec 6 i stuffed the tail approx rnds 93-103 not very firmly so the body of my snake is unstuffed in the middle part approx between rounds 55-93 cut the thread leaving long tail for closing close the hole using a tapestry needle 5 princess snake freeamigurumi patternby@leta toyfox crown worked in the round with yellow yarn do not stuff round 1 30ch leave long free yarn tail at the beginning 30 ~50-70cm form ring by slip_stitch in 1st chain 30sc round 2-3 30sc * 2rnds 30 round 4 1sc skip next 2sts 3dc 1pico 3dc skip next 2sts *5 finish invisibly cut the thread weave in ends go back to yarn tail at the beginning using it make 29ss in foundation chains keeping the crown upside down finish invisibly the left yarn tail can be used for sewing to the head 6 princess snake freeamigurumi patternby@leta toyfox tiara worked back and forth with red yarn do not stuff row 1 23ch leave long free yarn tail at the 22 beginning ~50cm from the 2nd chain from the hook 22sc row 2 1ch turn 1sc 1hdc 2dc 1hdc 34 1sc 1hdc 1dc 2dc 1dc 1hdc 1sc 1hdc 1dc 2tr *2 1dc 1hdc 1sc 1hdc 1dc 2dc 1dc 1hdc 1sc 1hdc 2dc 1hdc 1sc cut the yarn make 2 details following this pattern fold both details together so that matched and work 34ss with yellow gold thread through both layers cut the thread go back to yarn tails at the beginning using one of the yarn tails make 22ss in foundation chains through both layers keeping the crown upside down the second yarn tail can be used for sewing to the head weave in ends optional you can decorate tiara with embroidering please see photo using yellow gold thread 7 princess snake freeamigurumi patternby@leta toyfox assembly and design please watch video at link to see how to sculpture and design the face of the snake find the point between rounds 25 and 26 in the middle between eyes step 1 stitch from it to the left and put 1st marker point 1 then step 1 stitch to the right from the middle stitch and put 2nd marker point 2 it s the best to use thread matching color of the head but actually this thread will be invisible in the end 1 thread a needle with strong thread in point 1 leaving long tail outside and pull it out at the outer corner of the right eye between rounds 14 and 15 2 insert the needle in the inner corner of the same eye and back it out in point 1 3 tight the thread carefully and fasten with knot repeat steps 1-3 one more time cut the thread and hide knot and thread tips inside of the head repeat steps 1-3 twice for left eye starting from point 2 1 thread a needle with strong thread in point 1 leaving long tail outside and pull it
